name: Shatter Stream
description:
This is my submission for the 2018 Summer "My First Game" Jam. This is my first attempt at creating a game in Unity and the first prototype I have ever shared with the public. I will be continuing to work on this game in the future.

Heavily inspired the game Super Smash T.V from the Super Nintendo, I wanted to create a similar but more modern game.

Credits

  • Music created with LMMS.
  • Sound Effects created using Audacity and my voice.
  • Sprites sourced from Itch.IO:
    • 16x16 Dungeon Tileset (0x72)
    • Pixel Shooter and Towers Asset Pack (finalbossblues)
  • Font is  Shatterboxx
